thread_title: New all in one discord bot

messages.raw_content:
Are you tired of using a different discord bot for every feature you use or do you want a full Free discord bot? 

We got you cover

Say hello to GuardX 

What is GuardX?

GuardX is a  complete free all in one discord bot 

Its features are 24/7 runtime, Moderation Commands, Music Plugin, Giveaway Commands, greeting new members and also says goodbye,  Xp Plugin,a Verification System  and a ticket system

Everything sounds good to your feeling? 
Want to invite the bot? go to https://guardx.pages.dev/invite
Have any questions or found any bugs? Join the discord server at https://guardx.pages.dev/server

GuardX has its own website: https://guardx.pages.dev

That's All for guardx
If you like the bot Upvote it Please
